documentation.text: @notice Split every received payment equally between the payees

@notice Lets a user withdraw some of their funds
 @param amount - the amount to withdraw
@notice Lets a user withdraw all the funds available to them
@notice Clear all balances by paying out all payees their share
@notice Pay all users their current balances

@notice Remove a user from the list of payees
 @param payee - address of the user to remove

@notice Add a user to the list of payees
 @param payee - address of the user to add
@notice Split every received payment equally between the payees

@notice Lets a user withdraw some of their funds
 @param amount - the amount to withdraw
@notice Lets a user withdraw all the funds available to them
@notice Clear all balances by paying out all payees their share
@notice Pay all users their current balances

@notice Remove a user from the list of payees
 @param payee - address of the user to remove

@notice Add a user to the list of payees
 @param payee - address of the user to add

devdoc.details: Allow to specify different rightsholder and split royalties equally between them.

params.payee: - address of the user to add

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.payee: - address of the user to remove

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdrawErc20(address).details: Will split evenly between all current payees only. Is not called      when payee is added or removed

params.token: - the token to split among all current payees

devdoc.title: Sample Royalties splitter contract

addPayee(address).notice: Add a user to the list of payees

payAll().notice: Pay all users their current balances

removePayee(address).notice: Remove a user from the list of payees

withdraw(uint256).notice: Lets a user withdraw some of their funds

withdrawAll().notice: Lets a user withdraw all the funds available to them

withdrawErc20(address).notice: Allow to withdraw payments made in ERC20
